review: Does the job decently for the price. If you use apps like youtube or other optimized apps, it works great. But if you're on a computer/android and screen share you will notice the pixelation. Still, does a good job for the price.
author: lime

review: Plays any and all videos from your phone or tablet rightonto your tv! Netflix, Disney, Googlemovies and tv and anything else you want to watch on your hi-def television!
author: Imageracin

review: Fist time use, great range and picture
author: Ernesto Carrillo

review: I own 3 if these so far. Only thing it needs is greater app support. But so far it's fantastic at what it does.
author: Luis Quinones

review: I think this is a good item. I have three. It extends my TV coverage.
author: Donald Nolen

review: I love it.  I am able to play music, videos. movies from my mobile phone and laptops.  I had to download other apps to be able to display my laptop screen, but, it works great.  I wish Google made native app and allow sharing of laptop and mobile phone; instead, of using 3rd party apps.  Giving 4 star instead of 5 star because lack of full support by native app and I had to download other apps.
author: S. Patel

review: I love this device. It made my (regular) TV smarter than any "Smart TV" in the market and it was only ~ USD $30 (really cheap). Also, it's so small that you really forget it's there.Things I use that are Chromecast-friendly:* Netflix* Plex (oh yeah!)* YoutubeI have everything I could possible want to watch on my TV thanks to this device.
author: Juan Ignacio Saba
